eu.fbk.knowledgestore.datastore.hbase.utils

Class AbstractHBaseUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.fbk.knowledgestore.datastore.hbase.utils.AbstractHBaseUtils
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HBaseUtils, OmidHBaseUtils, TephraHBaseUtils

    public abstract class AbstractHBaseUtils
extends Object
    Class defining all HBase operations.

                     throws DataCorruptedException,
                            IOException

        Throws:

        public abstract void processPut(Record record,
                                String tabName,
                                String famName,
                                String quaName)
        Process operations on the Resource table.
        Parameters:
        record - to be put.
        tableName - where operations will be performed.
        ops - to be performed into tableName.
        conf - object to connect to HBase.
        isPut - to determine if the operation is put or a delete.

      • count

        public abstract long count(String tableName,
                           String familyName,
                           XPath condition)
                    throws IOException
        Counts the records having the type and matching the optional condition specified. This method returns the number of matching instances instead of retrieving the corresponding Record objects.
        Parameters:
        type - the URI of the type of records to return
        condition - an optional condition to be satisfied by matching records; if null, no condition must be checked
        Returns:
        the number of records matching the optional condition and type specified
        Throws:
        IOException - in case some IO error occurs

      • createConfiguration

        public void createConfiguration(Properties properties)
        Creates an HBase configuration object.
        Parameters:
        properties - the configuration properties

      • getFilter

        public FilterList getFilter(XPath condition,
                            boolean passAll,
                            String[] famNames,
                            String[] qualNames,
                            String[] params)
        Gets filter based on the condition to be performed
        Parameters:
        condition - To be applied server sided
        passAll - boolean if all elements have to pass the test
        famNames - to be checked
        qualNames - to be checked
        params - that could be needed
        Returns:
        FilterList containing all filters needed
